src:
Pri prečkanju meje v Kolpi utonila moška
01 Nov 2019, 10:55 by STA

Gasilci iz Črnomlja so v četrtek iz Kolpe med vasjo Vukovci in Kovačjim gradom potegnili dve moški trupli. Moška - enega so iz Kolpe potegnili dopoldne, drugega popoldne - naj bi po prvih zbranih obvestilih utonila pri poskusu nezakonitega prestopa državne meje, so sporočili policisti.



Reka Kolpa Foto: Sta

ČRNOMELJ > Kriminalisti in policisti so opravili ogled kraja, o dogodku so obvestili dežurnega preiskovalnega sodnika in okrožno državno tožilko. Točen vzrok smrti bodo ugotovili s sanitarno obdukcijo. Za pomoč pri ugotavljanju identitet so kriminalisti že zaprosili tuje varnostne organe, so zapisali v današnjem sporočilu Policijske uprave Novo mesto.
Na območju novomeške policijske uprave so sicer v zadnjih 24 urah prijeli 21 tujih državljanov, ki so nezakonito prestopili mejo med Hrvaško in Slovenijo.
Krški policisti, ki varujejo zeleno mejo, so v četrtek zjutraj v Kostanjevici na Krki prijeli državljana Pakistana, ki je nelegalno prišel v Slovenijo. Črnomaljski policisti so v Ručetni vasi prijeli državljana Afganistana in Pakistana, ki sta v Slovenijo vstopila izven mejnih prehodov. Pri Zapudju so popoldne prijeli dva državljana Irana. Šentjernejski policisti so skupaj z novomeškimi na območju Cerovega Loga prijeli 15 državljanov Sirije in državljana Iraka.
text:
A male drowned when crossing the border at Kolpa
01 Nov 2019, 10:55 by STA

On Thursday, firefighters from Črnomelj pulled two men's bodies from the village of Kolpa between Vukovci village and Kovač castle. The man - one was pulled from Kolpa in the morning and the other in the afternoon - is said to have been drowned in an attempt to cross the state border illegally, according to the first collected information, police said.



Kolpa River Photo: Sta

ČRNOMELJ> Criminologists and police officers conducted a tour of the place and informed the incident on duty of the investigating judge and the District Attorney. The exact cause of death will be determined by a sanitary autopsy. Criminals have already asked foreign security authorities for help in identifying identities, the Novo mesto Police Department said in a statement today.
In the last 24 hours, 21 foreign nationals who have illegally crossed the border between Croatia and Slovenia have been apprehended in the area of the Novo mesto Police Administration.
Green border guards arrested a Pakistani citizen who arrived in Slovenia illegally on Thursday morning in Kostanjevica, Krka. Police officers in Črnomelj detained Afghan and Pakistani citizens in Ručna vas, who entered Slovenia outside the border crossing points. Two nationals of Iran were apprehended at Zapudje in the afternoon. The St. Petersburg police officers, along with the Novosibirsk police, arrested 15 Syrian citizens and Iraqi citizens in the Cervo Log area.
